attributes.action: Fight climate change and STOP unnecessary flights
attributes.additional_details: The government need to consider implementing fines/additional taxes or stopping this happening all together. There are alternative options which cause far less damage to the climate.
attributes.background: The subject of Climate change is very prominent in the media at the moment. It has been reported that bands have chartered  private jets to play their gigs and sports teams are flying 100 miles to play the other team. Something needs to happen to prevent this action.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about certain flights, but we're not sure which flights you want the Government to act on, or whether you want this to involve a ban on such flights, or additional taxes or other charges.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
